cms.query.QueryText:
SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS##
FROM ( SELECT QueryID, QueryName, QueryTypeID, QueryText, QueryRequiresTransaction, ClassID, QueryIsLocked, QueryLastModified, QueryGUID, QueryIsCustom, QueryConnectionString
FROM dbo.CMS_Query WHERE ClassID IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT 0 AS QueryID, 'selectall' AS QueryName, 0 AS QueryTypeID, 'SELECT NULL' AS QueryText, 0 AS QueryRequiresTransaction, c.ClassID AS ClassID, 0 AS QueryIsLocked, GETDATE() AS QueryLastModified, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' AS QueryGUID, 0 AS QueryIsCustom, c.ClassConnectionString AS QueryConnectionString
FROM CMS_Class c
WHERE c.ClassID NOT IN (SELECT ClassID FROM CMS_Query WHERE QueryName = 'selectall' AND ClassID IS NOT NULL) ) t
WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
